channel.title: [PI] Need a little help here [Rep++]
channel.description:
1. IP Tracker on character file Does any one know how to add IP to character data and make it keep track of last IP used to log on. I want to have a thing where it tells me who's IP last logged into the account so that I may prevent cheating.
2. Friend's list not working 100% I am not really sure if this is client or server-sided. I was told that the friend's list is broken on PI, like when you add someone, it stays either Green or Red even when it doesn't correspond. Ex. When someone is one, the added person's name is in Red. Any one know how to fix? I been given a fix before, but it turns its green rather than red even when they were on.
3. Improved player command Does anyone know how to track who's online? Like the command :: players shows you how many people are online and I want to know who is online, something similar to the cPanel on some delta sources.
4. PM log/Chat log/CC log/Trade log/Command logs and whatever else you can think of A way to save whatever people type in a PM into a text file. Same for the rest.

item.title: [PI] Need a little help here [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @PServ123 PServ123
item.description:
@PServ123 wrote:

I think you may have read wrong of what I needed from the player command.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

the only 1 thier that i can help is the pllayers command

here is my ::players command

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) { c.sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players online."); //c.pkPoints+=1000; //c.donator = 5; }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Need a little help here [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @PServ123 PServ123
item.description:
@PServ123 wrote:

  1. IP Tracker on character file
    Does any one know how to add IP to character data and make it keep track of last IP used to log on. I want to have a thing where it tells me who’s IP last logged into the account so that I may prevent cheating.

  2. Friend’s list not working 100%
    I am not really sure if this is client or server-sided. I was told that the friend’s list is broken on PI, like when you add someone, it stays either Green or Red even when it doesn’t correspond. Ex. When someone is one, the added person’s name is in Red. Any one know how to fix? I been given a fix before, but it turns its green rather than red even when they were on.

  3. Improved player command
    Does anyone know how to track who’s online? Like the command :: players shows you how many people are online and I want to know who is online, something similar to the cPanel on some delta sources.

  4. PM log/Chat log/CC log/Trade log/Command logs and whatever else you can think of
    A way to save whatever people type in a PM into a text file. Same for the rest.

Read full topic
